metadata.dc:author: Da Costa, M L
Schvartsman, S
Procianoy, R S
metadata.dc:description: The blood levels of DDT in two groups of girls from two districts of São Paulo (Brasil) were the same. Both groups were equal in age and nutrition. The difference in air pollution showed no influence on the blood levels of DDT.
metadata.dc:title: Influencia de la polución atmosférica urbana sobre los niveles séricos de DDT en los niños
[Influence of urban air pollution on DDT blood levels in children].
metadata.dc:publisher: Boletin medico del Hospital Infantil de Mexico
